```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
library(jsonlite)
cc <- fromJSON("current_cc_data.json") %>% as.data.frame() %>%
  select(course_number, section_number, teacherid, termid, schoolid, studentid, dateleft, sectionid) %>%
  filter(termid == "3000")
```

```{r}
write.csv(cc, "cc.csv")
```
